item.title: Spot the error on the nutrition label...
item.description: I usually only write about my own mistakes, but here I’m going to be writing about a mistake I noticed an error on the nutrition label of Quaker Oatmeal Squares cereal. The error is extremely minor (at least as far as I can tell), but it made me thinkâ€”this label has been printed and seen probably millions of times, and yet this error remains on the box to this day (as of mid-August 2020).
